means: （西班牙产的）科尔多瓦革，高级皮革； 科尔多瓦皮鞋
科尔多瓦革（制）的； (C-)科尔多瓦的
西班牙之科尔多瓦城的

sentence.Network_en: Clad in doublet and hose, and boots of Cordovan leather.
sentence.Network_cn: 穿着紧身背心, 马臀皮的靴子.

sentence.Network_en: Cordovan a fine leather originally made of goatskin but now more frequently of split horsehide.
sentence.Network_cn: 科尔多瓦皮革,高级皮革:最初用山羊皮制成的好皮子,现多用剖开的马皮.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 鞋子有哪些种类？_百度知道 ... steerhide 科罗拉多阉牛皮 cordovan 马臀皮 cowhide 母牛皮.
进出口专业英语词汇(C7) ... Cordova wool 科尔多瓦羊毛 cordovan 科尔多瓦皮革 cordrein 化纤夏服料.
英语词汇新译 C_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... cordon 哨兵线 Cordovan 科尔多瓦城的 cords 灯芯绒衣.
本次要为大家介绍的就是其采用马臀皮革(Cordovan)制作的钱包款式。马臀皮革可谓是最优质的皮革，除了质感、光泽和耐久度极佳 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Spanish cordován, former spelling of cordobán 'of Cordoba' (see sense 1 of CORDOBA), where it was originally made

means.word_mean: 1. a fine leather originally made in Cordoba, Spain

auth_sentence.content: He was wearing his usual charcoal turtleneck, Harris Tweed jacket, khakis, and collegiate cordovan loafers .
